name: Sandvich maker
description:
This is my entry for the Summer 2016 72h TF2Jam, which I made with Zellk!

Heavy and Pyro want to make the biggest sandvich ever, and you will help them!

Features several ingredients that aren't in the "basic" Sandvich recipe, as well as Poopy Joe (you have to be good to see him).

Music is More Gun, sound effects come from TF2 and Portal 2.

Pyro & heavy model come directly from TF2.

Version 1.0.1

  • Added buttons to toggle music and effects
  • Defeat now causes the sandvich to collapse
  • Gameplay unchanged
